title: Improved society
comment: If this helps those that make mistakes at work, stops people claiming benefits for medical issues due to sleep problems, helps those who would fall asleep driving, it could lower taxes and make society more efficient.

title: Medical Cures
comment: Those with health issues can live freely and with confidence, to get rid of their restrictions and constant needs and costs of medications, to restore quality of life and live well themselves and reduce stress and worry to their family/carers.

title: Mistakes
comment: When the implant is fitted, it might go wroung and lead to unjury, disability or death, and then people wish they had never gone through with it, as now they have no quality of life or even sleep problems, or worsened problems.

title: Failure
comment: The mplent could fail, whether during operation or if the user decides they want it out, it may not break down and could become stuck and they suffer physically, emotionally or they develop a disability or need painful surgery

title: Disadvantages
comment: For those without an implant, they will not be able to achieve as much as those with one, and this is unfair, giving them advantages in work and life, and might mean people feel less capable, depressed and second class, also it could lead to violence and segregation in society, resentment

title: Mental Health
comment: Individuals may become uncomfortable over time, even if the implant is removed, that they are conflicted and lose their sense of self and identity and become unstable and unsure how to live in this new society of natural vs technology.

title: Competition
comment: People might feel obligated to get an implant even though they don't want one and it is against their moral, personal and ethical desires, but to keep up with others, they compromise and do it.
